sentence.Network_en: The character of the hero is depicted to a nicety.
sentence.Network_cn: 男主人公的性格刻画得非常细腻.

sentence.Network_en: He figured out his program for the day to a nicety.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已经巧妙地排下了一天的工作程序.

n索引 ... niche 壁龛(适当的位置) nicety 精密,正确,纤细 nice 美好的,令人愉快的.
tutorial a. 指导的nicety n. 细节，精细roll n. & v. 案卷；卷动，滚动.
...和imposter都是采取非法手段霸占别人的合法物品。从下面的真题里也可以看到这两个词的GRE特征。nicety n. 准确, 精确distinction n. 区别, 差别; 知名.

list.abs: our divorce settlement was delayed by a year because our lawyer spent a lot of time arguing about legal niceties .由于双方律师花了许多时间讨论法律细节，我们的离婚推迟了一年多才解决。
our company accepts various diagrams of nicety accessories and samples processing , and can offerlist of the 17 % export added value tax invoice .公司承接各种精密配件的来图，来样加工，可以开具17%出口增值税发票。
other niceties are a reversing safety camera , engine start button and keyless entry .其他细节是扭转安全摄像头，发动机启动按钮和无钥匙进入。

information Warfare takes advantage of our reliance on , indeed our addiction to , automation and modern computerized niceties . information Warfare attacks our very way of life .信息战争利用了我们对自动化和现代计算机工具的依赖和沉迷。信息战争袭击的是我们的生活方式。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'folly, foolish conduct'): from Old French nicete, based on Latin nescius 'ignorant' (see nice)

entry.tran: (尤指好的礼仪或得体的举止方面的)细节，小节
entry.def: The niceties of a situation are its details, especially with regard to good manners or the appropriate behaviour for that situation.

example.ex: By the end of term, girls will have learnt the niceties of dinner party conversation...
example.tran: 到学期结束，女生们将完成对晚宴谈话礼仪细节的学习。

example.ex: He wasted no time with social niceties.
example.tran: 他没有在社交礼仪细节上浪费时间。

means.word_mean: 1. conformity with some esthetic standard of correctness or propriety;

sentences.sentence: "it was performed with justness and beauty"

means.word_mean: 2. a subtle difference in meaning or opinion or attitude;

sentences.sentence: "without understanding the finer nuances you can't enjoy the humor"
